differences.gitbook: - Regular meeting of Education Guild. This meeting covered: Education Guild Budget Request Discussion - Dework PBL Budget Request Discussion - Education Quarterly Report Discussion
differences.supabase: - Education Guild Budget Request Discussion - Dework PBL Budget Request Discussion - Education Quarterly Report Discussion

differences.gitbook: Slate greeted everyone, then started off the meeting by discussing the projects that education guild is taking forward to next quarter. These are: CCCP Automation, Ai for Beginners, CCCP Website, Webinar Series.
differences.supabase: Slate started the meeting greeting everyone

differences.gitbook: After going through each project there was a discussion regarding the webinar series and through multiple suggestions and ideation we were able to set up a proper process to move forward with the project.
differences.supabase: Then started off the meeting discussing the projects of education guild taking forward to next quarter

differences.gitbook: Then after finalising the education guild budget request, tevo presented his dework pbl wg budget request.
differences.supabase: Projects are : CCCP Automation, Ai for Beginners, CCCP Website , Webinar Series

differences.gitbook: WaKa had some concerns regarding the dework pbl budget request which were discussed and some were also made part of the budget request.
differences.supabase: Then after going through each project there was a discussion regarding the webinar series and through multiple suggestions and ideation were able to set up a proper process moving forward with the project

differences.gitbook: Then at the end of the meeting we took a look at the Q3 quarterly report for the education guild, made by clement and yemi solves; some adjustments were requested and presented by Slate.
differences.supabase: Then after finalising the education guild budget request , we went over to the dework pbl budget request and tevo presented his wg budget request
